ctx: Microsoft razočaral z rastjo dobička in prihodkov
content:
Microsoft je sporočil, da je imel
zaradi sankcij proti Rusiji, ki je napadla Ukrajino, 126 milijonov
dolarjev dodatnih stroškov.
No, ta je pa dobra.
Ob vseh teh miljardah, ki jih pušimo vsi vpleteni v Rusko -
Ukrajinski spopad :)
author: 0531Zavar

ctx: Microsoft razočaral z rastjo dobička in prihodkov
content:
glej, kaj se je pa tem revezem zgodilo...

RUB appreciation has increased equity from €1.9bn to €3.5bn,
resulting in a 52bp positive impact on CET1 in Q2 - unicredit
author: crt

ctx: Microsoft razočaral z rastjo dobička in prihodkov
content:
Microsoft razočaral z rastjo
dobička in prihodkov
Je nižja rast zaradi Windows 11?

"Windows 11 adoption among Steam users cracked 20% in June, up
1.64% to a total of 21.23%. Though Windows 10 is still the most
popular OS by far, at 71.26% of the total surveyed, the jump may
mean that Windows 11(opens in new tab) is finally starting to take
root among gamers after becoming available to the general public
late last year. That could be because a lot of problematic bugs and
bits of annoying features have been patched since release."

www.pcgamer.com/just...indows-11/
By Jonathan Bolding published 24 days ago

"Windows 11 review ... Windows 11 is simpler and more streamlined,
but it's also not finished
Pros
+Clean, attractive new look
+Improved tools for managing focus and screen space
+Simpler, more intuitive menus
+Cortana no longer included by default

Cons
-Demanding system requirements
-Native Android support and other features missing at launch
-Widgets add little value
-Teams integration meaningless unless you love Teams"
www.tomsguide.com/re...windows-11
author: aimon
